QuestData.Title: The Executor In the Field
QuestData.Description: I can keep you busy here in town all week... but you seem to be more the fighting type.$b$b<Elreth looks you over and nods.>$b$bYes, you'll do just fine. I'd like you to go talk to Executor Arren. Follow the path north, out of Deathknell. You'll find him not far past the barricades.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Executor Arren at Deathknell in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.RewardText: What do we have here? A new $c, ready for battle, eh?
